question: What is Inheritance?
candidates: The ability to represent multiple classes under one common name
Basing the implementation of an object off another object
The hiding of the implementation of code from the user
The restriction of access to an object's data and behaviour

question: Which of the following is not a benefit of Inheritance?
candidates: Ability to easily extend the features of existing code
Inheritance maximises the reuse of existing code
Ability to make implementations of existing objects more specific
The user doesn't need to know how the object is implemented

question: True or False? The properties of a child class can always be used in the parent class
